revision.text:
{{Wired embedded system |brand=BeagleBoard.org |model=BeagleBone |revision=Black (Rev C) |upc=640522710690 |ean=0640522710690 |asin=B00K7EEX2U <!-- Green: B012TW5C7M --> |newegg= <!-- Oops: 9SIAKBE9CZ9324 --> |price=55 |manuf_country=China, USA |is_manuf=No |manuf=Element14 |manuf_model=BBONE-BLACK-4G |est_release_date=03/2014 |type=single-board computer |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.1 |cpu1_brand=Texas Instruments |cpu1_model=Sitara AM3358;(AM3358BZCZ100); |cpu1_cspeed=1 GHz |fla1=4 GiB |fla1_brand=Kingston |fla1_model=EMMC04G-S100 |ram1=512 |ram1_brand=Kingston |ram1_model=D2516EC4BXGCB |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=2 |jtag=optional |serial=yes,, 6-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1),, J1 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=SMSC |eth_chip2_model=LAN8710A |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=32K I2C Serial EEPROM;Microchip;24LC32AT-I/OT;;1;,,, Low-Power 3D HDMI Transmitter;NXP;TDA19988BHN;;1;,,, ESD Protection Diode for HDMI Ports;NXP;IP4283CZ10;;2;,,, Dual Buffer and Driver with 3-State Outputs;TI;SN74LVC2G241DCU;;1;,,, Single Positive-edge-triggered D-type Flip-flop;TI;SN74LVC1G74DCT;;1;,,, Single Buffer/Driver with Open-Drain Outputs;TI;SN74LVC1G07DCKR;;1;,,, Single Inverter Buffer Driver;TI;SN74LVC1G06DCK;;1;,,, 4 Channel ESD Solution for USB;TI;TPD4S012DRY;;2;,,, 500ma Low Noise Voltage Regulator;TI;TL5209D;;1;,,, Power Distribution Switch;TI;TPS2051BDGN;;1;,,, Single Chip PMIC;TI;TPS65217C;;1; |flags=Micro HDMI, Micro SD Card slot, GPIO, I2C, SPI, CAN Bus, |stock_boot=U-Boot;2014.04; |stock_os=Linux;3.8.13-bone47;Debian 7.4; |tp_firmware=Debian, Arch Linux (Arm), OpenWrt, |default_ip=192.168.8.2 |default_user=debian |default_pass=temppwd |oui_eth=50:72:24 }} {{TagLine|BeagleBone Black Board}} :[http://beagleboard.org/black Product page]
{{See also|BeagleBoard Devices|List of SBCs}}
The board can be powered by 3 different methods: *5V/1A power supply plugged into the connector *USB Female Micro-B 5V/1A *Expansion connectors: Micro HDMI output
===Specifications=== *CPU: [[TI]] AM3358 BZCZ100 @1GHz (ARM Cortex-A8) :◦NEON floating-point accelerator :◦2x PRU 32-bit microcontrollers :◦3D graphics accelerator :;Connectivity :◦USB client: power, debug and device :◦1x USB host port, 1x Ethernet port :◦Micro-SD Card slot, Micro HDMI output :◦2x 46 pin headers - 5x UART, 7x ADC, :◦66x GPIO (3.3V), 2x I2C, I2S, SPI, CAN :;Software :◦4Gb eMMC Flash w/ Debian distribution :◦Board size: 3.4" x 2.1"
===See also=== :https://beagleboard.org/boards *[[BeagleBone Black]] • [https://beagleboard.org/black PPage] *[[BeagleBone Blue]] • [https://beagleboard.org/blue PPage] *[[SeeedStudio BeagleBone Green|BeagleBone Green]] • [http://www.seeedstudio.com/wiki/Beaglebone_green PPage] *[[SeeedStudio BeagleBone Green Wireless|BeagleBone Green WiFi]] • [https://www.seeedstudio.com/SeeedStudio-BeagleBone-Green-Wireless-p-2650.html PPage] *[[BeagleBoard X15]] • [https://beagleboard.org/x15 PPage] *[[BeagleBoard xM]] • [https://beagleboard.org/beagleboard-xm PPage] *[[PocketBeagle]] • [https://beagleboard.org/pocket PPage]
